import Card from "react-bootstrap/Card" import { UserDataType } from "../../../types/Interfaces" import classes from './ProfileHeader.module.css' import { useContext } from "react" import Global from "../../../context/Global" import { isAvatar } from "../../../types/guards " type ProfileProps = Omit interface ProfileExtendsProps extends ProfileProps { avatar?: string } const ProfileHeader = ({userLogin, userEmail, avatar}: ProfileExtendsProps) => { const {localStore} = useContext(Global) return (
  • {userLogin}
  • {userEmail}
 ) } export default ProfileHeader
